hero.slogan:
Beyond the Hype
A True Community Force
hero.subtitle: Discover the power of a community-driven token on the Solana blockchain.

about.title: This is CoinMarketCapped
about.text: We're not just another coin; we are a movement. Born on the high-speed, low-cost Solana blockchain, CMC is a tribute to the power of community and the universal language of humor. Our mission is to create a decentralized ecosystem where every member has a voice and a stake in our collective success. We're leveraging the power of memes not just for laughs, but to build a resilient and vibrant community poised for long-term growth.

features.title: Core Principles
features.feature1_text: CMC is owned by its community. Key decisions and future developments are guided by community consensus.
features.feature2_text: CMC was launched with transparency at its core. The majority of the supply is dedicated to the community.
features.feature3_text: Leveraging Solana's lightning-fast network for near-instant transactions and incredibly low fees.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.text: Our token distribution is designed for community trust and long-term growth.

roadmap.title: Our Strategic Roadmap
roadmap.phase1: Phase 1: Ignition & Foundation - Successful fair launch, initial community growth on X, and listing on major Solana DEXs.
roadmap.phase2: Phase 2: Expansion & Visibility - Aggressive influencer marketing campaigns, listings on CoinGecko and CoinMarketCap, and community contests.
roadmap.phase3: Phase 3: Utility & Ecosystem - Development of unique holder utilities, partnerships with other Solana projects, and securing listings on major CEXs.

footer.text: CoinMarketCapped. For the community, by the community.

shop.title: CMC Merch Shop
shop.product_name: CMC "Make Meme Coin Fun Again" Cap
shop.product_description: The official cap of the CoinMarketCapped community. High-quality embroidery, one size fits all. Show your support!
shop.shipping_unavailable: Shipping to your country is currently unavailable.
shop.review1_text: This hat is legendary! The quality is amazing and I get compliments everywhere I go. A must-have for any real CMC holder.
shop.review2_text: WAGMI! Finally, some merch that gets it. Bought one for myself and my brother. To the moon!
shop.review3_text: I wear this cap to all the crypto meetups. It's a great conversation starter. #CMC
shop.review4_text: Solid quality, feels durable. Looks exactly like the picture.
shop.review5_text: This is the uniform for the CMC army. Glad to be a part of this community.
shop.review6_text: Got my cap last week and I haven't taken it off. Super comfortable.
shop.review7_text: The stitching is top-notch. You can tell this wasn't cheaply made.
shop.review8_text: Let's go! Best meme coin, best community, best cap.
shop.review9_text: If you're thinking about getting one, just do it. You won't regret it.
shop.review10_text: Proud to represent CMC with this awesome gear.
shop.review11_text: The shipping box arrived open, but the product's quality is quite good.

orientation.rotate_device: Please rotate your device for the best experience
